name: UltraBlade
description:
Destroy all blocks as fast as possible.

[Controls]

-Move: [Arrows]  -Jump: [Up]  -Attack: [X] and [C] on air  -Run: [C] hold  -Dash: [Z] hold to hover  -Double Jump: [Up] 

[Other controls]

-Change stage: [Q + left or right] -Game speed: [Numbers 1 to 9] (use with caution)
